content: this pattern is also available for free on my website here 1 learn to crochet the feather stitch this one-row repeat is about to become a new favorite stitch for your next baby blanket project i cannot get enough of this texture similar to the puff the feather stitch is created by inserting your hook and yarning over several times to get seven loops on your hook then you yarn over and pull through all seven loops the feather stitch s unique appearance is achieved through inserting your hook in three different places as you create the stitch once you get the hang of it this is a super mindless pattern i made this blanket for a dear coworker expecting her first baby she happened to love the colors i used in my pretty in panels stitch sampler crochet baby blanket and i was excited to use a similar colorway for her gift the blanket is completed with a camel stitch border for a cozy finish i love the camel stitch border and have used it often i hope you enjoy this pattern abbreviations us chain s chain s half_double_crochet s half_double_crochet s pm place marker repeat repeat round s round s single_crochet s single_crochet s slip_stitch slip_stitch skip skip space space st s stitch es yo yarn over special stitch feather st* yo insert your hook into the chain-1 space pull up a loop you will have three loops on your hook yo insert your hook in the chain-1 space beneath the chain-1 space from two row back pull up a loop you will have five loops on your hook yo insert your hook into the next chain-1 space from the previous row pull up a loop you will have seven loops on your hook yo and pull through all seven loops *i have included many step-by-step photos demonstrating this stitch in the pattern materials brava worsted weight 4 medium 100% premium
